metadata.exif:ImageDescription: Picture: CORBIS..American soldier Floyd James Thompson was captured on March 26, 1964 and released March 16, 1973. He spent 10 days short of 9 years (8 years, 355 days) as a POW, he is the longest held POW of the Vietnam war and longest held POW in the United States history.
